sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: [This section of the Training Plan provides a management summary of the entire plan.]

subsections.title: Background and Scope
subsections.content: [This subsection provides a brief description of the project from a management perspective. It identifies the system, its purpose, and its intended users. It also summarizes the Training Plan and its scope.]

subsections.title: Points of Contact
subsections.content: [This subsection provides organization name, title, and contact information for key roles such as Project Manager, Program Manager, QA Manager, Security Manager, and Training Coordinator.]

subsections.title: Document Organization
subsections.content: [Describes how the Training Plan document is organized.]

subsections.title: Security and the Privacy Act
subsections.content: [Provides a brief discussion of system security controls, data protection requirements, and Privacy Act considerations.]

subsections.title: Glossary
subsections.content: [Contains a glossary of all terms and abbreviations used in the plan, or references the OPDIV glossary if applicable.]

subsections.title: Needs and Skills Analysis
subsections.content: [Describes target audiences, their skills, and training needs. May include a task-skill matrix and discuss audience groupings such as headquarters or field offices.]

subsections.title: Development Approach
subsections.content: [Discusses the approach used to develop the course curriculum, including methods, objectives, and topics to be covered.]

subsections.title: Issues and Recommendations
subsections.content: [Lists foreseeable training issues, provides recommendations and identifies constraints or limitations.]

subsections.title: Training Methodology
subsections.content: [Describes the training methods, materials, and formats used. Includes course outlines, instructor guides, student materials, and evaluation approaches.]

subsections.title: Training Database
subsections.content: [Identifies and describes the simulated training database, its purpose, and how it will be developed or used during training.]

subsections.title: Testing and Evaluation
subsections.content: [Describes how training effectiveness and student performance will be tested and evaluated. Includes feedback and course evaluation mechanisms.]

subsections.title: Course Administration
subsections.content: [Describes training administration methods â€” enrollment, tracking, certification, progress reports, and record management.]

subsections.title: Resources and Facilities
subsections.content: [Lists required training resources: classrooms, equipment, materials, and special needs.]

subsections.title: Schedules
subsections.content: [Presents training implementation schedule, milestones, responsible parties, and estimated efforts.]

subsections.title: Future Training
subsections.content: [Discusses periodic updates, retraining, and future improvements in training materials and delivery.]

subsections.title: Purpose and Scope
subsections.content: This section assists project managers in managing training materials such as seminars, presentations, or tutorials. It emphasizes keeping this as a living document updated throughout the project lifecycle.

subsections.title: Training Materials List
subsections.content: [Provides a table detailing training materials, including document name, version, format, date delivered, intended audience, and storage location.]

sections.title: Training Curriculum
sections.content: [Describes all training courses and modules, including objectives, duration, audience, prerequisites, resources, and future ownership and maintenance of training materials.]

sections.title: Training Plan Approval
sections.content: Acknowledgement and approval form for project stakeholders confirming review and acceptance of the Training Plan.

sections.title: References
sections.content: [Lists referenced documents with their name, version, description, and location.]

sections.title: Key Terms
sections.content: [Provides definitions and explanations for key terms and acronyms relevant to the document.]
